CustomField.description: IF( AND( Percent_of_Monthly_Call_Goal_Complete__c >= 1, Data_Collection_Completed_Current_Month__c >= Monthly_Data_Collection_Goal__c, Surveys_Completed_Current_Month__c >=Monthly_Survey_Goal__c, OR(to_Appt_Goal_Actual__c >= 1, ISBLANK(to_Appt_Goal_Actual__c))), Pitches_This_Month__c, Monthly_Pitch_Goal__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Prorated to Pitches This Month when % to Appt Goal Actual is at least 100%
CustomField.label: Pitch Goal Formula
